runs.comm: length delivery on off, the batsman slices it down to third man for a single
that is the strangest thing ever! Shahzad comes forward and shoulders arms to a length delivery.. First time
length delivery on off, the batsman hops on his toes and defends this to point
he is batting with some self-restraint here! Length delivery on pads, he comes right behind and defends it..Interesting.. how long can he go on like this?
length delivery on off, the batsman looks to push it to off, but gets an inside edge to square leg
Tarakai tries to do a Shahzad as he looks to launch this length delivery over long-on, misses it completely
he has had the defensive pill today! He jumps up and defends the length delivery
wonderfully hit! No violence in this shot. He gets some width and steers it through cover point with a lot of timing
length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it to midwicket for a single
hits it across the line to drag one from outside off to the sweeper on the leg side
good bowling by Haseeb! It's on a length and it's heading for the off and middle stump. Shahzad comes forward and defends
wonderful delivery! This one swings away from a length and beats the bat as the batsman is sucked into a poke
length delivery, the batsman flicks it to deep square leg, taking it with the angle of the delivery
full delivery on the pads, the batsman looks to dab it towards the leg side, but gets some inside edge on to his pads
so Tarakai has been handed the duty to be aggressive! He launches into  a length delivery and slices it over the bowler's head for a boundary...Not in control of that one, but that's a boundary

oh no, he has perished at deep midwicket! Nadeem takes a wonderful catch right at the edge of the boundary. He was running towards the deep square leg area and controls it nicely. Tarakzai was drawn into a pull, but he couldn't get the distance he would have liked
he stays in the crease and punches the length delivery to mid on
slower this time, Shahzad is not going to wake up from his zone today.. he defend this back to the bowler
looks to crash this through point, but he gets a bottom edge through to the keeper
fuller delivery outside off, Stanikzai comes forward and drives it straight to mid off

oh this could have been a run out! It was a suicidal run and the batsman is very lucky.. he dabs it to the leg side and midwicket runs through, fields the ball and flicks it to the stumps, but misses. He could have run all the way and taken the bails off himself.. the batsman was nowhere in the frame
stays in the back foot and defends it to midwicket

whoa! Now this is a Shahzad shot! He clears his front leg out and punches the length delivery through extra cover.. The way he opened the stance it looked like he was going through the leg side.. but no
hmm, he is spreading his wings..It's a length ball that meets the bat when it's coming down the arc.. Smashed over mid-off
fuller delivery on off, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket for a single
allows the ball to come to him before turning it to square leg for a single
takes a steps down the pitch and looks to pull it over midwicket, but doesn't get hold of the shot. He manages to clear the infield though
Bizarre! Shahzad goes instinctively for a pull to a short ball on the leg stump line, but it hits the back of the bat and goes to the boundary at third man region.. Smiles all around
Oh Shahzad! What are you on today? This one is pushes with love through cover point.. just a mere push and it teases two fielders all the way to the boundary
stays in the crease and defends the length delivery to midwicket
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman is beaten, he gets a little outside edge that hits the keeper's pads
pushed through on off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
quicker and on the pads, the batsman tucks it to short fine leg for a single
flatter and quicker, but this is too far down the leg side

oh no, what a drop! What have you done Aizaz! Shahzad had given it up completely after going for an across the line swipe..The top edge went to midwicket where the fielder makes a complete hash of this..Drops a sitter..He was under it just fine
fuller delivery, the batsman pushes it to midwicket for a single
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends
starts off with a length ball, the batsman slices it down to third man
back of length delivery on off, the batsman stays on the back foot and nudges this to off side and takes a single
throws his bat at this wide one but misses it completely
hurries this on and hits the pads, but this was heading down the leg side
quick delivery on the stumps, Shahzad defends it down the pitch
he looks to cut it through off but there is not much room, he is beaten by the extra bounce too
drifts on to the pads, but the batsman misses out as it hits the pads
straighter delivery on off stump, the batsman works it away to deep square leg for a single
flatter delivery on off, it's punched back to the  bowler
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to extra cover and it's another dot ball
some good pace from Irfan! It's short of length and bounces extra to beat the batsman's poke
back of length again, but there is some width and Shahzad chops it down to third man
goes deep into the crease and flat bats a short of length delivery to long on
he is beaten again! Shahzad looks to slide it down to third man but plays inside the line
now he plays his natural shot - a flat batted swipe - but he still misses. The extra bounce taking the ball over the bat
he charges down the pitch and manages to get a toe-end to this fuller delivery, chipping it over the bowler's head in the process
comes down the pitch and drives the full delivery down to long on for a single
fuller delivery, nicely driven with a straight bat, but straight to the bowler
here come the sun! Shahzad moves to the leg side and hammers the full delivery over wide long-on. That has travelled some good distance. Afghanistan need some more of those
yorker length delivery, the batsman jams his bat down
goes leg side again creating room and clobbers this to the sight screen! Yes, Shahzad is officially on the move. Superb hit
oh  poor delivery now! The bowler fires it down the leg side - obviously flustered by those two shots - and gives away extras
tossed up wide outside off, the batsman squeezes it through cover. A very expensive over this one
length delivery on off stump, the batsman waits on the back foot and pushes it to deep midwicket for an easy single

he has perished this time! Stanikzai stays on the back foot and looks to flat-bat this short delivery over the wide long on boundary, but the fielder does well to nicely get under it and complete a good catch. Hong Kong break a threatening stand.
he stays in the crease and runs it down to third man for a single
short delivery outside off, the batsman drags it to square leg with an awkward looking pull
short delivery outside off, the batsman drags it to wide mid-on for a single
length delivery wide outside off, he goes for a loose cut shot and is beaten
pushed through on off side, the batsman tucks it to midwicket with soft hands and picks up a good couple
bowls an arm-ball that hits the batsman's pads, but that was heading down leg
quicker delivery, the batsman punches it to deep midwicket for a single
full delivery on the pads, the batsman gets down and sweeps it fine to deep backward square leg boundary
bowls a quicker slider, the batsman gets hit on the pads as he looks to nudge it to the leg side. they takes a single anyway
he pushes this with soft hands to midwicket to pick up another couple. This is a wonderfully constructed innings. Half-century for Shahzad
short of length delivery on off side, the batsman drags it to the leg side for a single. It's also a front-foot no ball
Run for cover, here comes the chopper! Fuller length delivery outside off, and Shahzad has smashed it over wide long on for a six. This helicopter is as as effective as the Indian one. What a shot!
now smartly dabs it to third man for a single
good delivery, this one takes off from a length and beats the outside edge
he stays on the back foot and punches this length delivery to cover
short outside off, the batsman whacks it to deep midwicket for a single
he stays in the crease and steers the back of length delivery down to third man to keep the strike

waits for this one, chops it on to point and takes off for a single. Shahzad is in trouble taking this run, but he comes between the throw and the bowler.. they appeal for obstructing the field, but Shahzad wasn't even looking in the direction of the ball. So he is safe
waits on the back foot and punches this length delivery to deep extra cover for a single
fuller delivery on off stump, the batsman whips it to the leg side for a single
on the pads, this is smartly swept to the deep backward square leg boundary.. No chance for anyone.
shuffles across and tucks this one behind square on the leg side for a single
this is punched uppishly to deep midwicket for a single - with a straight bat - looked very stylish
makes room and thumps this back of length delivery over extra cover, but there is protection in the deep
again, moves to the leg side, but punches it straight to extra cover

another drop! This one is at third man. What a time to drop! What a player to drop! The thick top edge carried comfortably but the third man didn't really move forward.. Completely misjudged.. It falls short of him in the end.
he bowls a good follow up yorker. It's dug out back to the bowler
moves to the leg side and slaps this one straight to mid-off. They think about a single as the fielder fumbles the ball, but decide against it
this is murderous now! He moves to the leg side, the bowler chases him with a back of length delivery, Shahzad then plays a cross-court forehand to power this to the deep midwicket boundary.
poor delivery! A full toss on the pads. The batsman nonchalantly flicks it to deep backward square leg boundary. Hong Kong are coming apart
oh dear, another one down the leg side! An easy call for the umpire
full delivery on the stumps, the batsman clips it to deep midwicket for a single

oh what a stunner! Magnifico! After all those drops, you don't expect these, but Irfan Ahmed takes a screamer to send Shahzad back. It was a slower delivery that the batsman punched over extra cover with wonderful timing - it looked set to make it to the boundary, but Irfan Ahmed dives forward to pluck it just above the grass. Call it my poor judgment but i was expecting that to be dropped as well
length delivery, punched to deep midwicket for a single
fuller delivery outside off, driven down to long off with ease
low full toss outside off, the bastman punches it to long on for a single
ho ho! Low full toss outside off, this is muscled with a lot of power over wide long on.. It disappears in the night sky. Powerful strike
he looks to pull this one to the leg side, but gets a top edge that beats the short fine leg fielder

another monster strike! He looks like he not in control as he drags this length delivery from outside off, but it keeps going away.. over deep midwicket. That's flat and that's long. How good was that!
now he smartly dabs it to off side for a quick single

full delivery on the pads, the batsman tickles it down to the gap at deep square leg. But this third one could be the end of Shafiqullah as a good throw comes in quickly ..He dives to get back, but he could be in trouble..He has managed to slide the bat in.
my god what a striker! This is length delivery on off and Shafiqullah sends this over deep square leg with a powerful swipe. Third six of the over. Hong Kong have been sixed out of this match now
starts off with a good yorker, the batsman flicks it to midwicket for a single
no stopping Shafiqullah! It's a very good yorker, but the batsman is down on his knee and paddles this one fine down the leg side for another boundary. What poise! What hitting!
low full toss on off, the batsman punches it to long on for a single
length delivery, pushed straight to midwicket
fuller delivery on off, Nabi drives it to long off for a single

Yes he can! he bends down on his knee and whacks the slower delivery over deep square leg with a powerful sweep shot! Half-century for Shafiq off only 24 deliveries and a much-needed win for Afghanistan
